website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for glass bowls that can go from the dinner table to the refrigerator, this generous set of 8 is a great choice.
pros: These bowls may be on the small side, but are useful when it comes to prepping meals, serving, and storing food
Bowls are dishwasher-safe, and stack easily for storage
cons: Lids will likely shrink if you put them in the dishwasher, and they aren't leak-proof
Some bowls arrived with chips on the rims

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Lids
customer_reviews.text: I use these small bowls for my homemade yogurts. After awhile the lids that came with these bowls where getting harder to put on. It seems like the lids was shrinking or maybe from the hot water I use to wash them. I tried to find replacement lids for the bowls, but with no luck. Then one day I searched again and found these silicone stretch lids for mason jars. So I bought a set of ten to try it out. They worked great, but you must be sure the silicone lids and bowls are dry to work properly. So if you need to replace the lids try out these lids. Here are some pictures to see how they look.
customer_reviews.author: EY DESIGNS

customer_reviews.title: After multiple use no chips no breaks
customer_reviews.text: This custard cup size glass bowl is a must have, even without the lids. I cook in them freeze in them and store small portion of leftovers in them. As fast as I clean them they are used again before being put back on the shelf. Poached eggs, double jello shots, single serving quiche, frittata, apple crumble, individual dipping sauces etc. are only a few of my uses. They are thick glass and not only durable, but pleasing to the eye. For the price I would buy these to use for making gift candles or natural face scrubs etc., as well. The lids really are top rack dishwasher safe after multiple washings and continue to fit tightly.
customer_reviews.author: recessdawn

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I had bought a similar set from another company, and the lids started falling off right away. These lids you really have to push hard to get them on and off (but not so hard it hurts my arthritic hands), and they stay sealed. I use the constantly in the freezer and the fridge, for leftovers and deserts.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: QA failure (1 out of 24)
customer_reviews.text: One of the two dozen bowl sets we ordered came out of the mold badly and was not picked up on final Quality Assurance. Makes a good "keep the water for testing skillet temperature" bowl so we are keeping it. Just a gentle note to the manufacturer that there is some room for process improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Why Did It Take Me So Long to Buy These
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mis en place bowls on a whim. Since they arrived I use them almost daily. Each time I get one out I ask myself, "Why didn't I buy these a long time ago." They are perfect for assembling ingredients before cooking (the reason I bought them), but I find myself using them for a variety of other purposes ranging from a small serving of soup to storing leftovers. They are versatile and inexpensive and a must have for every kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: NOSocDoc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and made here in the US
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are the perfect size for snacking, serving condiments and putting leftovers away with the covers. I have other Anchor Hocking dishes/ bowls and just love them. I was particularly interested in being able to heat small amounts of left overs in the microwave, without storing in plastic containers and heating food in them. This helps me skip that step. I probably wouldn't heat the cover in the microwave, not put them in the dishwasher. I don't want to risk warping them. Simple enough. Great purchase. Tough little bowls.
customer_reviews.author: TerryU

customer_reviews.title: 8 bowls vs 6 at a third of the cost of brand name bowls.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these types of bowl for cooking prep work where she keeps ingredients ready before cooking. I use this mainly to store left overs. We have a set of the brand name ones (initial PC) & wanted to get some more. The price was prohibitive now that both of us are retired. For more than a third of the cost of PC, we are getting 8 instead of 6 bowls also so it's a no brainer. It's just a little smaller and missing the capacity measurements but they're dishwasher and microwave safe. We're happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allan C. Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Great snack size!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My kids enjoy those yogurt "flips" and this way I can make my own and save a ton of money. The covers fit tight and they portion out a great snack amount. The glass is thick and durable. I've only had them a day but will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: jenna n

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand. Maybe Pyrex
customer_reviews.text: Very poor glass quality. Several of them have already chipped along the brim and I’m not rough with them at all. It’s too bad too because I think they’re perfect little glass containers.
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: Libby Small Glass Bowls with LIds
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this item. They are very sturdy and made of thick glass. The lids do not warp in the dishwasher. They work well in distributing ingredients prior to cooking or baking. They are also the perfect size for small left overs such as chopped onions or parsley, etc. I like to use them for ice cream dishes for my young grandchildren. Perfect size for little tummies.
customer_reviews.author: Oma Boogie

customer_reviews.title: I love these damn things
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, love the seal on the lids. I use them for everything from storage, to dipping, and even just a little something to nibble out of. Just DONT put the lids in the dishwasher they can and will shrink and warp! Update: My father just stumbled across a great solution should you lose or destroy the lids - the 8oz 4C Panko Breadcrumbs lid fits perfectly on them. Nice find, Pops!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted small pyrex bowls but Amazon was out of them. I'm glad because I absolutely love these little bowls! The lids fit tightly and they are perfect for a sliced avacado, apple, grapes etc! I also put my granddaughter's leftovers from lunch in them and she can pull it out later in the day, heat and eat. Microwave well too. Very happy and I will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Jennw/7

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: These break very easily. I had one fall less than foot and when the edge hit the surface several shards of glass went everywhere. I was expecting these to be a lot tougher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for face masks, side dishes, sauces—great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Bowls are a great size for putting out little side dishes that often accompany Asian cuisines, as well as dipping sauces for appetizers, and I have also been using them to hold face mask mixes for easy application. The accompanying lids are a life- (and product) saver as I can now just cover and refrigerate. The size is perfect (probably 1/2 cup capacity), no chips or cracks yet discernible, and I have had no issues in putting lid and bowl into the dishwasher. Overall very pleased with this product and durability thus far has held out. Will update if anything should change.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good diameter, don't stack well
customer_reviews.text: Many containers this size are 4" in diameter so they don't fit well in the top rack of the dishwasher with glasses. Since these are only 3.45" they do fit well which is the main reason I chose these over others. My only nit with them is that they don't stack well. They do stack but the stack is wobbly vs. fitting together well. Because of that they can only be stacked about 4 high in my cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: whocares

customer_reviews.title: A Great Bowl For My Elderly Mom & A 2 Year Old Toddler
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of small portion sized glass bowls but the lids make these one of the best purchases I've made. My 88 year old Mom wants to save portions of her meals for later, especially fruit. Personally I hate leaving food out, but I try to respect her wishes. Magically I POP on the lid and put the bowl within her reach. Now we are both happy.
customer_reviews.author: Walkitout

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for many months now and I use them often. I use them for dipping and salsa. I also use them to store peeled garlic or bacon grease in the fridge. You can pour hot bacon grease directly into it since it’s glass, let it cool, put the lid on and have it for cooking later, which is super convenient. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Corinthians 5:7

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, design flaws
customer_reviews.text: There are some major design flaws that would have prompted me not to buy these if I was aware of them. But overall, I give it three stars because these things just will not break. Part of the design flaw is how hard the lid is to get off. If you are not extremely careful, the act of taking the lid off the bowl will catapult it across the room. After having done this multiple times, it has become a definite pet peeve. But it's never broken or chipped. I'm not sure I'm convinced that these are actually made of glass.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi S

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Bowls For Baking
customer_reviews.text: These little glass bowls are really nice for when I am baking and I want everything measured out before I put it all together or for storing leftover frosting or juice. Pro: They are really sturdy and do not feel cheaply made, the lids fit really nicely and you can stack the bowls when you are storing them and they are dishwasher safe. Con: They aren’t that big and I can’t fit more than 1/2 a cup in the bowls but other than that they are really nice. Overall I recommend these bowls for anyone who likes to have their ingredients measured out before baking.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great little glass containers
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a result of getting an InstantPot electric pressure cooker. Among other things, I can make fabulous vegetable or meat broths in the IP, and I also use broth in many recipes. Often small quantities, just enough for the steam pressure. These work wonderfully to freeze smallish quantities of broth. They have thawed in the fridge during the day when I remember, or safely in the microwave (plastic lid loosened) when I forget. They are happy in my dishwasher. The lids fit tightly and securely.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S

customer_reviews.title: perfecto except.............................
customer_reviews.text: these are rad I use them to pre-measure stuff for crockpot meals so in the morning before work i can just dump it all in!! the only not great thing is one time i put vinegar in it and somehow the vinegar ended up leaking in the morning?? i don't know if it was like condensation or something but don't use them for vinegar i guess xo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bowls! What I like about them most is that they have a lid and they don't leak. They are a little larger than most glass bowls and are perfect for leftovers. Because of the etched surface design on the outside, they are an attractive addition to the table when serving desserts.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie Mey

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Containers
customer_reviews.text: I use these to measure spices, store sauces, and other random storage/cooking needs. I have put these in the microwave for a minute at a time and they've been fine. They serve the exact purpose that I was looking for and are true to their description.
customer_reviews.author: mathilde beniflah

customer_reviews.title: These are nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these little bowls. They're a nice size for storing small quantities of leftovers and also for doing advance preparation of various chopped ingredients. The lids fit snugly (unlike some other ones I bought). Not sure if they're leak proof since I'm not storing liquids in mine. Now, if I can just train my husband to use the lids instead of reaching for the plastic wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Flower

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT! They have made cooking so much easier for me. I've had them for a few months now and couldn't be happier. They wash well in the dishwasher and aren't so fragile that they break. I've dropped them a few times in the sink and were just fine. Lids fit great and they don't leak at all, I've used several liquids/ sauces in these to pack in my lunches. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great little bowls
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought these for my nephew (was on his Christmas list), but when they arrived, I wanted some for myself. These are awesome little bowls. Great for prep work or for storing single servings of different foods. The first thing I used them for was individual puddings. They are awesome. I do not have a problem with the lids fitting like some people have mentioned, but I don't think they are water-tight. They might leak if turned upside down. However, I have not tested this out yet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boyea-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for at-home chefs who want to step up their cooking game! These are ok for dipping sauces, depending on what you're dipping (they're a little deep for my preference), but I prefer to use them for storing various ingredients while prepping food or sauces. The caps are great for storing leftover ingredients in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I could pre-portion my cats food vs messing around w/the cans each day and storing 1/2 a can of cat food in my frig. I haven't tested liquid in these but the lids seem very tight and the glass seems thick enough to hold up for a long time. I loved the first set so I purchased a second that could be used to store other small amounts of leftovers. Each will hold aprox the size of a can of cat food, maybe a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great little bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bowls! They're perfect for sauces, condiments, portioning during cooking, etc etc. And if there's anything left over, or I need to keep the flies out of it, it's too easy to pop a lid on and set it in the fridge/ to cover it. They hold about 6oz of fluid to the brim.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in great condition, shipped fast, and are exactly what I was looking for. They are perfect for dipping sauce or to put a small portion controlled snack in like nuts. The lids are strong and sturdy and seal very well.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Missing one bowl
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time but missing one bowl, there was seven not eight. I don’t want to have to return item, so I guess I got screwed out of one bowl
customer_reviews.author: Vidia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These little dishes have made Feeding our Sheltie really easy. We open one can of food every couple of days and portion it out. Then, morning and evening, we just reach in the fridge, pop off the lid, and feed her. They have been easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without them all these years?!
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift last Christmas- I asked my husband for small glass storage containers (I am tired of all the plastic ones falling on me when I open my cupboard). These are wonderful for cooking prep (spices, small amounts of herbs, garlic, onion, etc.) and I use them for small leftovers (half a lemon), and I take small portions of things like tuna salad for lunch. The lids are totally leak proof, they are dishwasher-safe, and the lids do not warp. I am buying some for friends this year as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect recipe prep bowls with lids
customer_reviews.text: Needed some bowls to use for mise en place or food preparation. These are perfect and I love that they came with lids so I can do in advance. They’re also perfectly sized for sherbet and small serving bowls. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Booksrmything

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These came quickly and were just as advertised. They come in different sizes, so be sure to know what you're ordering. We got these as small ice cream bowls and weren't too interested in the lids, but boy have they come in handy! We use them for small portion leftovers, and the kids have even taken them to school in a lunch box. Don't hesitate on these.
customer_reviews.author: T B

customer_reviews.title: Great little bowls with lids
customer_reviews.text: I often have just bits of leftovers, or maybe half a lemon, that need storing in the fridge. These are just the right size for that and the lids are both sturdy and easy to get off even when the bowl is cold or slippery from condensation. I expect they also be much uses are prep dishes, with and without the lids. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bluffton Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Great little glass storage bowls
customer_reviews.text: I wanted small bowls with lids to store small amounts of leftovers, like sauce, berries, dressings, nuts, etc. This fit the bill. great size with tight fitting lids. I prefer storing food in glass vs. plastic so these work out great.
customer_reviews.author: Morab Rider

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Stackable, Strong Lids!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stackable and easy to clean. Theses little bowls are perfect for dips, puddings, for use in preparing ingredients for a recipe. The lids are strong, no leakage concerns. I recommend hand washing the lids to preserve the excellent fit & form.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT order again. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Just too small! Yes these are measured for 1 cup. But they need and should have had extra room so items won’t spill as being moved. Or if you want to mix something in them - there is no extra room. Instead order them from Pampered Chef instead. Hope they make a change and fix this. If they do I’d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: OASF1

customer_reviews.title: Great buy/value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have fresh soft dog training treats in various easy access places around the house and I'm happy I got these. They are a great price for what you get. They have a nice tight seal on them and keep the treats fresh, easy to remove lids, and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use them to portion out my ingredients before cooking and baking and they do a fanstasic job! I think they measure about a cup each?! If I make a dipping sauce that needs to be chilled or are leftovers the lids come in handy. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: You get a quality product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend since she wanted a smaller sauce container. These work great for that purpose and have been really sturdy with rough handling here and there. The lids don't stand out to me too much because I rarely use them, but you can store ingredients you've prepared in these glass bowls well. The design works for me and it should work for you if you're just looking for tiny containers for a myriad of uses. I bought my mother another set and she loves them, too!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for food prep and anything else you want to Use them for. They can hold up to 1/2 a cup
customer_reviews.author: lisa fryer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I use these bowls every day. They are great for refrigerating small portions. They can be stacked in the refrigerator and don't take up much room. Before I bought them I had read in someone else's review that they can go in the freezer, so I use them in the freezer, too. The lids are heavy duty and seal very well. I like that the glass is swirled on the outside. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Will use these for spices during major recipe ingredient requirements. When a recipe calls for multiple spice ingredients you really want to measure them out in advance so you do not inadvertently leave something out or double.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: These little bowls are great
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. They're a nice size for small items like chocolate chips or nuts and for storing small amounts of leftovers in the fridge with the lids. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: S. Thrane

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use them 😃
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bowls today. I can’t wait to use them. I bought the bowls for holding ingredients for cooking but they can be used for a number of different things. Very pleased 😀
customer_reviews.author: mhmiles

customer_reviews.title: Good for dog food
customer_reviews.text: I got them to prep raw meals for my dogs while I travel and they work great. I label the tops with a permanent marker and the marking stays even after washing. They’ve been washed in the dishwasher, frozen, and shoved around by hungry dogs and they are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of these, large enough to hold half of a lemon, or leftovers from a small serving of oatmeal and everything in between. The lids are tight--which I like. I super love these! I can send yogurt and fruit in these with my daughter's lunch. Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMSS

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for cooking or baking. I use them when I bake desserts or smoke meat. It makes it easier to portion out ingredients. Also when you was a single serving on the go.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect little prep bowls when baking/prepping meals and great to hold pudding/yogurt/ice cream servings. I love that they came with lids too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: As pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a box packaged more securely. Well done! The bowls are as pictured. They can be used with or without the lids and look nice enough to use for service at a special event. The lids fit tightly and are not flimsy. I can see myself using these bowls in many situations.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for leftovers, sauces and pastes
customer_reviews.text: i hand washed the lids as one reviewer suggested. I did not want to take a chance that they would not work. So it adds a little work but its worth it
customer_reviews.author: lollypop

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make my own healthy jello, perfect size, stacks nicely in my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crooms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making individual servings of homemade baby foods. The lid allows so store the leftovers in the fridge too. Sturdy enough glass that i can use a hand blender in it and dirty up less dishes
customer_reviews.author: Lori C. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We love these! Great for portioning out ingredients while cooking. Great for storing small amounts of leftovers. Great for taking a handful of almonds or something like that to work.
customer_reviews.author: AStewart

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked to have gotten a little bigger, but that is my fault. These are about the size of a baseball. Really nice for taco bar so I could cut items up the night before, put the lid on and pop them in the refrigerator overnight. Very cute and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ES2015

customer_reviews.title: Good small bowls
customer_reviews.text: They work as expected. They are small and perfect for portioning spices for a meal or putting something like ketchup in for fries.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Deeper than they appear
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sturdy little cups, but they are deeper than they appear making them not as versatile as I had hoped as little bowls and containers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moses

customer_reviews.title: Great small bowls with lids!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for everything I literally use these for everything Super sturdy They wash well Great size Love that they come with lids
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great for mis en place
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for mis en place use because I like to make curries, moles, and other complicated constructions from scratch. These are inexpensive and a perfect size for what I'm using them for. The lids fit tightly but I didn't buy them for the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Ektarama

customer_reviews.title: Nice portion bowls.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bowls. The glass is thick. They are easy to clean. The lids fit great however I have had one leak so I did not give it a five.
customer_reviews.author: Cape meares

customer_reviews.title: Not the size in the description
customer_reviews.text: Here is the problem. The description says..8, 6 inch glass bowls with lids. But the bowls are only 3.25" in width. Returning...
customer_reviews.author: Jim Smetana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  little glass bowls with covers.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these little glass bowls with covers. They are the perfect size. Sturdy because they are made by libby glass comp. These are really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Francine M.Roccuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Meal Prep
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for Mise en Place and keeping chopped veggies in my fridge for easy omelettes in the morning and stir frys. Great for dressings too and little portions of leftovers. Not leak proof so I wouldn't use to transport but they are indispensable in my kitchen and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: CGR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Glad I chose these over similar plastic ones. I've been trying to reduce plastic waste in our house so I use these to portion our fruit, yougurt and snack cups for lunches. Great size, lids stay on in lunchboxes, and they're easy to clean. I'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Olyvya Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portion size
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot for my Plant Based youtube channel and these help me portion the food out prior to filming. Helps tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these! It came with all of them unlike most people have said. I use them all the time and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Savanha Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Just like on the TV cooking shows
customer_reviews.text: When you need many small bowls for measured amounts, these are the right size. I ordered 2 sets of these and may get another set.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lewis

customer_reviews.title: So handy for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Never though i would use these as much as i do, good size.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes to make jello for the kids and these are perfect for that. I like the fact that they have lids for when I need to store something else. I haven't checked if they are leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Handy for so many things!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little dishes. They are perfect for so many things, like taking a serving of hummus to work with you or saving the last bit of a sauce or a meal. I keep chopped walnuts in one dish and store it in the freezer -- the airtight lid keeps them fresh and ready for me to sprinkle on my hot oatmeal. I had no idea I'd find so many uses for them. Quality lids and attractive glass.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny in Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and quick to clean. Very useful for storage small portion left overs or storing spices and small kitchen items. Lid is a BIG plus point.
customer_reviews.author: Moody

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control in packing.
customer_reviews.text: I like them but these came with 8 ramekins and only 7 lids.
customer_reviews.author: Tara F

customer_reviews.title: Spice cups
customer_reviews.text: We are using these bowls for spices, and recipe ingredients. Very handy, especially with the lids.
customer_reviews.author: MCPCMP

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bowls! They feel heavy duty and the perfect size for recipe and food prep which is why I bought them. There's just the right amount, 8 bowls. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy glass and perfect size for small portions. Plastic lids fit snuggly. Well packaged for safety and protection.
customer_reviews.author: SherJ

customer_reviews.title: These are a must for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These are so versatile! I used them on a charcuterie board for olives and spiced nuts. They’re also great for leftovers and/or prepping. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easy
customer_reviews.text: I had not even used these yet and stacked them in my cupboard and they slid to the side and one chipped. I was a bit surprised and bummed. I do really like these as they are great for my small fruit that i take to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found this...
customer_reviews.text: Product I bought: Libbey Small Glass Bowls with Lids, 6.25 ounce, Set of 8, Clear, 3.45-inch - 55454 It was securedly packed. I am happy with my purchase, the item was what I was looking for - comes with a lid, perfect size for mini desserts I make and it’s a glass.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lipiano

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy to clean storage bowls with lids
customer_reviews.text: Good for storing left overs, clear glass makes easy to view whats inside.. comes with lids which is why I decided to buy . Cleans well in the dishwasher. Stackable .
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: great little bowls - lids are ok
customer_reviews.text: The glass bowls are great, we use them for everything. The only note is that the lids are not microwavable - the suction causes them to warp beyond use. Minor thing to be aware of, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are perfect for condiments, dip, candy, or anything else you can think of.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Lidded custard bowls
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for cooking/baking prep as well as small storage because they have lids!
customer_reviews.author: littlebit602

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very useful little prep bowls. Lids make advance prep a breeze. Good quality and value. I recommend these for things like individual pudding servings too! Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: SSK-LA

customer_reviews.title: Lids fit tight
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for small portions left over, homemade dressing, grated cheese, chopped whatever, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalBill

customer_reviews.title: MealPrep/Storage
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I am going to re-order these. Terrific, highly recommend product and seller!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Good size for individual portions. I liked how these are not wide and shallow, which is really helpful for storing and serving liquid food items.Each bowl comes with a white plastic lid.Package arrived intact and right on time.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bowls. Very useful as portion bowls when baking or cooking and having lids make them useful for snacks on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Rhedz

customer_reviews.title: We bought a second set.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We bought 2 sets. Use for pudding, dipping sauce single portions, left overs, anything. We use them constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Evy M. Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for prepping spices etc for curry or any recipe with a lot of ingredients. Lids mean you can prep cold ingredients in advance and keep fresh. Great for individual servings of dips.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Parlin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic small food storage
customer_reviews.text: Magic bowls. These are simply fantastic for small food storage in the refrigerator. I wish they came in a larger size too!
customer_reviews.author: Saint

customer_reviews.title: Glass bowl
customer_reviews.text: It's withstood a few drops and temp changes. They dont hold much, but theyre well made.
customer_reviews.author: P$

customer_reviews.title: Super useful.
customer_reviews.text: Freaking love these things. Use them for a ton of different purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon L. Tyson III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Prep work
customer_reviews.text: love these, they are pretty versatile and excellent for mean prep
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for charcuterie boards
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Small bowls to use in appetizer boards and these work great! Will be nice for dips as they come with lids.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for food prep or baby food storage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to store baby food and now use them for food prep and a million other little things. Sturdy and clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Very nice size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Holds 2/3 of a cup almost to top. I’m going to use them for butter dishes at a banquet
customer_reviews.author: Winter Texan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know how much I really needed these until I finally bought some. Great for the little leftover stuff and dips etc
customer_reviews.author: Yasmina Ferraris

customer_reviews.title: What every cook needs
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bowls. They are perfect for premeasuring ingredients for cooking but also great for little portions of nuts and the lids are awesome when you have just a small amount of food to store in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. Tzourakis

product_meta.title: Libbey Small Glass Bowls with Lids, 6.25 ounce, Set of 8, Clear, 3.45-inch -
product_meta.description: Adulting is hard, especially when it comes to eating healthy. But if you're going to food-prep your way into being a mature salad-eating adult, you might as well look like one. So pack up these glass bowls for easy on-the-go work lunches. And try not to eat them before 10am.
feature_bullets: Mature bowl set keeps leftovers looking fresh and tasting delicious
Ideal for weekly meal prepping - including healthy office snacks
Includes 8, 3.45-inch diameter glass bowls (2.25-inch height) with plastic lids
Durable and dishwasher safe for quick, easy cleanup; to help preserve your products, please refer to the Libbey website for care and handling instructions

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
